a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population with alcohol use disorder vs. drug use disorder,
Share of the population with an alcohol use disorder versus the share with drug use disorder (which does not include alcohol
or tobacco smoking). Drug use disorders include opioids, cocaine, amphetamine and cannabis.
Share of population with drug use disorders
Share of population with alcohol use disorders
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); Our World In Data
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
